oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andrew Jackson portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Andrew Jackson (1767-1845) Color portait, Jackson standing in military uniform with a telescope and hat in hands. Signature at bottom.
Jackson served as Major General of the Tennessee Militia 1802-1814 and as Major General in the U.S. Army 1814-1821.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845
Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845;New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Southern States--History--War of 1812
